title: The story of Jetzer, taken out of Dr. G. Burnet's letters with a collection of miracles wrought by popish saints, during their lives, and after their deaths, out of their own authours, for information of all true-hearted Protestants : with a prefatory discourse, declaring the impossibility and folly of such vain impostures.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by R. Taylor,
